title: Project Vacation
description: This full-stack app, built with React, an API, and a database, lets users register, log in, and explore vacations. Users can like vacations, while admins can add, edit, delete, and view vacation stats. Token-based authentication ensures secure access. Contact me for admin credentials to explore advanced features!

title: Project RMQ-Queue
description: This full-stack application, built with React, a custom API, and a database, integrates RabbitMQ (RMQ) for real-time queue management. It features two pages: a customer page where users can join a service queue and track their turn, and an admin page where admins can view and manage the queue, assisting customers in real-time.

title: CryptoManiac
description: This Vanilla JavaScript project uses three APIs to deliver real-time cryptocurrency data. Search for any crypto, view its price in USD and ILS, and track favorites with a live graph showing current value changes. Perfect for monitoring the crypto market in real-time.
